original_text: Those Hebrews who had previously been with the Philistines and had gone up with them to their camp went over to the Israelites who were with Saul and Jonathan.
korean_text: 전에 블레셋 사람들과 함께 하던 히브리 사람이 사방에서 블레셋 사람들과 함께 진영에 들어왔더니 그들이 돌이켜 사울과 요나단과 함께 한 이스라엘 사람들과 합하였고

sentences.original_text: who had previously been with the Philistines
and had gone up with them to their camp
who were with Saul and Jonathan
